content: I’m just confounded. If the UN had not censured Israel for building new settlements, then the new settlements that were announced today would not have been built? The “turn the other cheek” response is also interesting — Christians who have the New Testament should know that this was Jesus’ admonition to us all. It seemed to me that the resolution called on Israel to be honest. Don’t pretend to have a 2-state solution on the table while continuing to build new settlements on the West Bank.
